verses.padam: - Padam yajñEna|vai|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|asRujata|tAḥ|upayaḍBirityupayaṭ-Biḥ|Eva|asRujata|yat|upayaja̍ ityupa̍ - yajaḥ|upayajatItyu̍pa̍ - yajati|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|tat|yajamAnaḥ|sRujatE|jaGanAd^^rdhAditi̍# jaGana - ad^^rdhAt|avEti|dyati|jaGanAd^^rdhAditi̍# jaGana-ad^^rdhAt|hi|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra - jAyantE|sthavimataḥ|avEti̍|dyati|sthavimataḥ|hi|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra-jAyantE|asa̍BiMndannityasa̱M̍ - Bindann|avEti|dyati|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra - anAnA̱m|asaBEMdAyEtyasa̱M̍ - BEdAya|na|paryAvartayatIti̍# pari - Avartayati|yat|paryAvartayEditi̍# pari - AvartayE̱t|udAvartaḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|grAhukaḥ|syAt|samudram|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|rEta̍ḥ|1̍ (50)
verses.samhita: yajñEna vai prajApatiḥ̍ prajA asRujata̍ tA upayaḍBi̍-rEvAsRu̍jata̍ yadupayaja̍# upayajati̍ prajA Eva tad yajamAnaḥ̍ sRujatE jaGanArddhAdava# dyati jaGanArddhAddhi prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ sthavimatO&va# dyati sthavimatO hi prajAḥ prajAyantE &saBiMndannava̍# dyati prAṇAnA-masaBEMdAya̍ na paryAvartayati̍ yat paryAvartayE̍dudAvartaḥ̍ prajA grAhukaḥ̍ syAth samudraM gacCa̍ svAhEtyAha̍ rEta-̍ [ ] 1

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|tat|dadhAti|antarikṣam|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|antari̍kṣEṇa|Eva|asmai|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|janayati|antari̍kṣam|hi|anviti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra - jAyantE|dEvam|savitAra̱m|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|asmai|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|janayati|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ̍ - rAtrE|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti|Aha|ahOrAtrAByAmitya̍haḥ̍ - rAtrAByA̱m|Eva|asmai|prajA iti# pra-jAḥ|prEti|janayati|ahOrAtrE̍ ityahaḥ-rAtrE|hi|anviti̍|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prajAyanta̍ iti# pra-jAyantE|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA-varuṇau|gacCa|svAhA̱|2̍ (50)
verses.samhita: Eva tad dadhAtyantari̍kṣaM̍ gacCa svAhEtyAhA&ntari̍kṣEṇaivAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ pra janayatyantari̍kṣaṅq̍ hyanu# prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ dEvaṃ savitAra̍M̍ gacCa svAhEtyAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ EvAsmai̱ prajAḥ pra janayatya-hOrAtrE̍ gacCa̍ svAhEtyAhA-hOrAtrAByA̍-mEvAsmai̱̍ prajAḥ pra janayatya-hOrAtrE̍ hyanu# prajAḥ prajAyantE̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ gacCa svAhE- [ ] 2

verses.padam: - Padam iti|Aha|prajAsviti̍# pra - jAsu|Eva|prajA̍tAsviti̍ pra - jAtAsu|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa - apAnau|dadhAti|sOma̱m|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti|Aha|saumyAḥ|hi|dEvata̍yA|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|yajñam|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti|Aha|prajA̍ iti# pra-jAḥ|Eva|yajñiyA̱ḥ|karOti|CandAṃsi|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|dyAvA̍pRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱-pRuthivI|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti|Aha|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|prajAtA̍ iti pra-jAtAḥ|dyAvApRuthivIByAmiti̍ dyAvA̱ - pRuthivIByA̱m|uBayataḥ|parIti̍|gRuhṇAti|naBa̍ḥ|3̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -tyAha̍ prajAsvEva prajAtAsu̍ prAṇApAnau dadhAti̍ sOmaM̍ gacCa svAhEtyAha̍ saumyA hi dEvatayA̍ prajA yajñaM gacCa̍ svAhEtyAha̍ prajA Eva yajñiyA̱ḥ karOti CandAṃsi̍ gacCa svAhEtyAha̍ paśavO vai CandAṃsi̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE dyAvApRuthivI̍ gacCa̍ svAhEtyAha̍ prajA Eva prajAtA̍ dyAvApRuthivIByA̍muBayataḥ̍ pari# gRuhṇAti naBO-̍ [ ] 3

verses.padam: - Padam divyam|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti|Aha|prajABya̍ iti# pra-jAByaḥ|Eva|prajA̍tABya̍ iti pra - jAtAByaḥ|vRuṣṭi̱m|nIti|yacCati|agnim|vaiśvAnaram|gacCa|svAhA̱|iti̍|Aha|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|Eva|prajAtA̍ iti pra - jAtAḥ|asyAm|pratIti|sthApayati|prAṇAnAmiti̍# pra-anAnA̱m|vai|Eṣaḥ|avEti|dyati|yaḥ|avadyatIya̍va̍ - dyati|gudasya̍|mana̍ḥ|mE|hArdi̍|yacCa|iti̍|Aha|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|yathAsthAnamiti# yathA - sthAnam|upEti|hvayatE|paśOḥ|vai|Ala̍bdhasyEtyA-̍ labdhasya|hRudayam|śuk|RucCati|sA|hRudayaśUlamiti̍# hRudaya - śUlam|4 (50)
verses.samhita: divyaM gacCa̍ svAhEtyAha̍ prajABya# Eva prajAtAByO̍ vRuṣṭiM niyacCatyagniM̍ ~Mvai̱śvAnaraM gacCa̍ svAhEtyAha̍ prajA Eva prajAtA̍ asyAM prati# ṣṭhApayati prAṇAnAM ~MvA EṣO&va# dyati yO&vadyati̍# gudasya manO# mE hArdi# yacCEtyAha̍ prAṇAnEva yathAsthAnamupa̍# hvayatE paśOrvA Alabdhasya̍ hRudayaṃq̍ śugRucCati̍ sA hRudayaśUla-̍ [ ] 4

verses.padam: - Padam aBi|samiti|Eti|yat|pRuthivyAm|hRudayaśUlamiti̍# hRudaya - śUlam|udvAsayEdityut̍ - vAsayE̱t|pRuthivIm|śucA|arpayEt|yat|aPsvityap-̍ su|apaḥ|śucA|arpayEt|śuṣkasya|ca|Ardrasya̍|ca|sandhAviti̍# saM - dhau|uditi|vAsayati|uBaya̍sya|śAntyai̱|yam|dviṣyAt|tam|dhyAyEt|śucA|Eva|Enam|arpayati||5̍ (32) (rEtO# - mitrAvaruṇau̍ gacCa svAhA - naBO# - hRudayaśUlaM - dvAtriṃśacca)̍ (A1)
verses.samhita: -maBi samEti̍ yat pRuthivyAṃ̍ hRudayaśUla-mu̍dvAsayE̱t̍ pRuthivIṃ śucA&rpayEd̍ yadaPsvapaḥ̍ śucA&rpayEcCuṣka̍sya̍ cA&&*rdrasya# ca sandhAvudvAsayatyuBaya̍sya̍ śAntyai yaM dviṣyAt taM dhyAyE-cCucaivaina̍-marpayati||5̍ (rEtO# - mitrAvaruṇau̍ gacCa svAhA - naBO# - hRudayaśUlaM - dvAtriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yajñam|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|vIti|aBajanta|tata̍ḥ|yat|atyaśi̍ṣyatEtya̍ti-aśi̍ṣyata|tat|abruvann|vasa̍tu|nu|naḥ|idam|iti̍|tat|vasatIvarI̍ṇAm|vasatIvaritvamiti̍# vasatIvari - tvam|tasminn|prAtaḥ|na|samiti̍|aśaknuvann|tat|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|prEti|avEśayann|tAḥ|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|aBavann|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|gRuhṇAti|yajñaḥ|vai|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|yajñam|Eva|AraByEtyA̱̍ - raBya|gRuhItvA|upEti̍|vasati|yasya̍|agRu̍hItAḥ|aBIti̍|nimrOcEditi̍# ni - mrOcE̱t|anArabdha̍ ityanA̱ - rabdhaḥ|asya|yajñaḥ|syAt|6 (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yajñamAgnI̱ddhrE vyaBajanta̍ tatO yadatyaśiṣyata̍ tadabruvan̍ vasatu̍ nu na# idamiti tad vasatIvarI̍ṇAM̍ ~MvasatI varitvaM tasmin̍ prAtarna samaśaknuvan̍ tadaPsu prAvEśayan̍ tA vasatI̍ varIraBavan̍ vasatIvarI̱rgRuhṇAti yajñO vai vasatI̍ varI̱ryajñamEvA&&*raBya# gRuhItvOpa# vasati yasyAgRuhItA̍ aBi nimrOcE-danArabdhO&sya̍ yajñaḥ syA̱- [ ] 6

verses.padam: - Padam yajñam|vIti|CindyAt|jyOtiṣyA̱|vA|gRuhṇIyAt|hira̍ṇyam|vA|avadhAyEtya̍va̍ - dhAya|saśu̍krAṇAmiti̍ sa-śukrAṇAm|Eva|gRuhṇAti|yaḥ|vA|brAhmaṇaḥ|bahuyAjIti# bahu - yAjI|tasya|kuMByA̍nAm|gRuhṇIyAt|saḥ|hi|gRuhItava̍satIvarIka̍ iti# gRuhIta - vasatIvarIkaḥ|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|gRuhṇAti|paśavaḥ|vai|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|paśUn|Eva|AraByEtyA̱-̍ raBya|gRuhItvA|upEti̍|vasati|yat|anvIpam|tiṣṭhann̍|gRuhṇIyAt|nirmArgu̍kA̍ iti# niḥ - mArgukAḥ|asmAt|paśava̍ḥ|syuḥ|pratIpam|tiṣṭhann̍|gRuhṇAti|pratiruddhyEti̍# prati - ruddhya|Eva|asmai|paśUn|gRuhṇAti|indra̍ḥ|7̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dyajñaM ~Mvi cCindyA-jjyOtiṣyA̍# vA gRuhṇIyAddhiraṇyaM̍ ~MvA &vadhAya saśukrAṇAmEva̍ gRuhṇAti̍ yO vA̱ brAhmaṇO bahuyAjI̍ tasya kuMByAnAM̍ gRuhṇIyAth sa hi gRuhIta̍ vasatIvarIkO̍ vasatIvarI̱rgRuhṇAti paśavO vai vasatIvarI̱ḥ̍ paśUnEvA&&*raBya# gRuhItvOpa# vasati yadanvIpaM̍ tiṣṭhan̍ gRuhṇIyAnnirmArgukA̍ asmAt paśavaḥ̍ syuḥ pratIpaM tiṣṭhan̍ gRuhṇAti pratiruddhyaivAsmai# paśUn gRuhṇAtIndrO̍-̍ [ ] 7

verses.padam: - Padam vRutram|ahann|saḥ|apaḥ|aBIti|amriyata|tAsA̱m|yat|mEddhya̱m|yajñiya̱m|sadE̍vamiti̍ sa - dEvam|AsI̱t|tat|atIti|amucyata|tAḥ|vaha̍ntIḥ|aBavann|vaha̍ntInAm|gRuhṇAti|yAḥ|Eva|mEddhyA̱ḥ|yajñiyA̱ḥ|sadE̍vA̍ iti sa - dEvAḥ|Apaḥ|tAsA̱m|Eva|gRuhṇAti|na|antamAḥ|vaha̍ntIḥ|atIti̍|iyAt|yat|antamAḥ|vaha̍ntIḥ|atIyAditya̍ti-iyAt|yajñam|atIti̍|manyEta|na|sthAvarAṇA̱m|gRuhṇIyAt|varu̍ṇagRuhItA̍ iti varuṇa̍ - gRuhItAḥ|vai|sthAvarAḥ|yat|sthAvarAṇA̱m|gRuhṇIyAt|8 (50)
verses.samhita: vRutramahanth̍ sO̱&(1q)pO̱&(1q)Byamriyata̍ tAsAM ~MyanmEddhyaM̍ ~Myajñiyaṃq sadEvamAsIt̍ tadatyamucyata̍ tA vahantIraBavan̍ vahantInAM̍ gRuhṇAti yA Eva mEddhyA# yajñiyAḥ sadEvA̍ ApastA sAmEva̍ gRuhṇAti̍ nAntamA vahantIratI̍yAd-̍ yadantamA̍ vahantIratIyAd̍ yajñamati# manyEta na sthAvarAṇA̱M̍ gRuhṇIyAd varuṇagRuhItA̍ vai sthAvarA̍ yath sthAvarAṇA̱MM̍ gRuhṇIyAd- [ ] 8

verses.padam: - Padam varuṇEna|asya|yajñam|grAhayEt|yat|vai|divA̱|Bava̍ti|apaḥ|rAtri̍ḥ|prEti̍|viśati|tasmA̱t|tAmrAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|divA̱|dadRuśrE|yat|nakta̱m|Bava̍ti|apaḥ|aha̍ḥ|prEti̍|viśati|tasmA̱t|candrAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|nakta̱m|dadRuśrE|CAyAyai̱|ca|Atapa̍ta̍ ityA̱ - tapataḥ|ca|sandhAviti̍# saM - dhau|gRuhṇAti|ahOrAtrayOrityahaḥ̍ - rAtrayO̱ḥ|Eva|asmai|varṇa̱m|gRuhṇAti|haviṣmatIḥ|imAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|haviṣkRu̍tAnAmiti̍# haviḥ - kRutAnAm|Eva|gRuhṇAti|haviṣmAn|astu|9̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -varuṇEnAsya̍ yajñaM grAhayEd̍ yadvai divA BavatyapO̍ rAtriḥ pra viśati̍ tasmA̱t tAmrA ApO divA# dadRuśrE yannaktaM BavatyapO&haḥ̍ pra viśati̍ tasmA̱ccandrA ApO naktaM̍ dadRuśrE CAyAyai# cA&&*tapataśca̍ sadhauM gRuhṇAtya-hOrAtrayO̍rEvAsmai̍ varṇaM̍ gRuhṇAti haviṣmatIrimA̍ Apa ityAha̍ haviṣkRutAnAmEva̍ gRuhṇAti̍ haviṣmAṃ# astu- [ ] 9

verses.padam: - Padam sUryaḥ|iti̍|Aha|saśu̍krAṇAmiti̍ sa - śukrAṇAm|Eva|gRuhṇAti|anuṣṭuBEtyanu̍ - stuBA̱|gRuhṇAti|vAk|vai|anuṣṭugityanu̍ - stuk|vAcA|Eva|EnAḥ|sarvayA|gRuhṇAti|catu̍ṣpadayEti̍ catuḥ̍ - padayA|RucA|gRuhṇAti|triḥ|sAdayati|sapta|samiti|padyantE|saptapadEti̍# sapta - padA|śakvarI|paśava̍ḥ|śakva̍rI|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|asmai|vai|lOkAya̍|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyaḥ|Eti|dhIyatE|amuṣmai̱|AhavanIya̍ ityA̱ - havanIyaḥ|yat|gAṛha̍patya̍ iti gAṛha# - patyE|upasAdayEdityupa̍ - sAdayE̱t|asminn|lOkE|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|syAt|yat|AhavanIya ityA̱ - havanIyE̱|amuṣminn|10̍ (50)
verses.samhita: sUrya ityAha̍ saśukrAṇAmEva̍ gRuhṇAtyanuṣṭuBA̍# gRuhṇAti vAgvA anuṣṭug̍ vAcaivainAḥ sarvayA̍ gRuhṇAti catuṣpadayarcA̍ gRuhṇAti̍ triḥ sAdayati̍ sapta saM padyantE̍ saptapadA̍ śakvarI̍ paśavaḥ śakvarI̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE &smai vai lOkAya gAṛhapatya̍ A dhIyatE&muṣmA̍# AhavanIyO yad gAṛhapatya̍ upasAdayEdasmin̍ ~MlOkE paśumAnth̍ syAd yadAhavanIyE&muṣmi̍n-̍ [ ] 10

verses.padam: - Padam lOkE|paśumAniti# paśu - mAn|syAt|uBayO̱ḥ|upEti|sAdayati|uBayO̱ḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkayO̱ḥ|paśumantamiti̍# paśu - manta̱m|karOti|sarvataḥ|parIti̍|harati|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|indrAgniyOritI̱ndra - agniyOḥ|BAgadhEyIriti# BAga - dhEyI̱ḥ|stha|iti|Aha|yathAyajuriti̍# yathA-yajuḥ|Eva|Etat|AgnI̱ddhra ityAgni# - iddhrE|upEti|vAsayati|Etat|vai|yajñasya̍|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA-jitam|yat|AgnI̱ddhramityAgni̍# - iddhram|yat|Eva|yajñasya|apa̍rAjitamityapa̍rA̍ - jitam|tat|Eva|EnAḥ|upEti|vAsayati|yata̍ḥ|Kalu̍|vai|yajñasya̍|vita̍tasyEti̍ vi - tatasya|na|kriyatE̱ ( )|tat|anviti|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|avEti̍|caranti|yat|vaha̍ntInAm|gRuhṇAti̍|kriyamA̍ṇam|Eva|tat|yajñasya̍|śayE|rakṣa̍sAm|ana̍nvavacArAyEtyana̍nu̍ - avacArAya|na|hi|EtAḥ|Ilayanti|Eti̍|tRutIyasavanAditi̍# tRutIya - savanAt|parIti|śErE|yajñasya̍|santa̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai||11 (76) (syA - dindrO# - gRuhṇIyA - dastva̍ - muṣmin̍ - kriyatE - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍ (A2)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkE paśumAnth̍ syAduBayOrupa̍# sAdayatyuBayOrEvaina̍M̍ ~MlOkayO̱ḥ paśumantaM̍ karOti sarvataḥ pari# harati rakṣasAmapa̍hatyA̍ indrAgniyOrBAgadhEyIḥ̍ sthEtyAha̍ yathAyajurEvaitadAgnI̱ddhra upa# vAsayatyEtadvai yajñasyAparAjitaM̍ ~MyadAgnI̱ddhraM ~MyadEva yajñasyAparAjitaM̍ tadEvainA upa# vAsayati yataḥ Kalu vai yajñasya vitatasya̍ na kriyatE ( ) tadanu# yajñaṃ rakṣAṅqsyava# caranti yad vahantInAM̍ gRuhṇAti# kriyamAṇamEva̍ tad yajñasya# śayE rakṣasA-mana̍nvavacArAya̍ na hyEtA̍ IlayantyA tRutIyasavanAt̍ pari# śErE yajñasya saMtatyai||11̍ (syA - dindrO# - gRuhṇIyA - dastva̍ - muṣmin̍ - kriyatE - ṣaḍviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam brahmavAdina iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|saḥ|tu|vai|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|yaḥ|sOma̱m|upAvaharannityu̍pa̍ - avaharann|sarvA̱Byaḥ|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|upAvaharEdityu̍pa̍ - avaharE̱t|iti|hRudE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|manuṣyE̱Byaḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|mana̍sE|tvA|iti̍|Aha|pitRuBya̍ iti# pitRu - Byaḥ|Eva|EtEna|karOti|divE|tvA|sUryA̍ya|tvA|iti̍|Aha|dEvEBya̍ḥ|Eva|EtEna̍|karOti|EtAva̍tIḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|sarvA̱Byaḥ|upAva̍haratItyu̍pa̍ - avaharati|purA|vAcaḥ|12̍ (50)
verses.samhita: brahmavAdinO# vadanti sa tvA addhvaryuḥ̍ syAdyaḥ sOmamupAvaharanth̍ sarvA̱ByO dEvatA̱Bya upAvaharEditi# hRudE tvEtyAha̍ manuṣyE̱Bya EvaitEna# karOti manasE̍ tvEtyAha̍ pitRuBya# EvaitEna# karOti divE tvA sUryAya̍ tvEtyAha̍ dEvEBya# EvaitEna# karOtyEtAvatIrvai̍ dEvatAstABya# Evainaṃq sarvA̱Bya upAvaharati̍ purA vAcaḥ- [ ] 12

verses.padam: - Padam pravaditOriti̍ pra - vaditOḥ|prAtaranuvAkamiti# prAtaḥ - anuvAkam|upAkarOtItyu̍pa-Aka̍rOti|yAva̍tI|Eva|vAk|tAm|avEti̍|rundhE|apaḥ|agrE̱|aBivyAha̍ratItya̍Bi̍ - vyAharati|yajñaḥ|vai|Apa̍ḥ|yajñam|Eva|aBIti̍|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujati|sarvA̍ṇi|CandAṃ̍si|anviti̍|Aha|paśava̍ḥ|vai|CandAṃ̍si|paśUn|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|gAyatriyA|tEja̍skAmasyEti̍ tEjaḥ̍ - kAmasya|parIti|daddhyAt|triṣṭuBA̱|indriyakA̍masyEtI̱ndriya̍ - kAmasya|jagatyA|paśukA̍masyEti̍# paśu - kAmasya|anuṣṭuBEtyanu̍ - stuBA̱|pratiṣṭhAkAmasyEti̍# pratiṣṭhA - kAmasya|pa~gktyA|yajñakAmasyEti̍# yajña - kAmasya|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|annakAmasyEtyanna̍# - kAmasya|śRuṇOtu|agniḥ|samidhEti̍# saM - idhA̱|hava̱m|13 (50)
verses.samhita: pravaditOḥ̍ prAtaranuvAkamupAkarOti̍ yAvatyEva̍ vAk tAmava# rundhE &pO&grE&BivyAha̍rati̍ yajñO vA ApO# yajñamEvABi vAcaM ~MvisRujati̍ sarvAṇi̍ CandAṅqsyanvAha̍ paśavO vai CandAṃsi̍ paśUnEvAva# rundhE gAyatriyA tEjaskAmasya̍ pari# daddhyAt triṣṭuBE̱ndriya kAmasya̍ jagatyA̍ paśukAmasyAnuṣṭuBA̱̍ pratiṣṭhAkAmasya̍ pa~gktyA yajñakAmasya̍ virAjA&nnakAmasya̍ śRuṇOtvagniḥ samidhA havaM-̍ [ ] 13

verses.padam: - Padam mE|iti|Aha|savitRupra̍sUta̍ iti# savitRu - prasUtaḥ|Eva|dEvatA̱Byaḥ|nivEdyEti# ni - vEdya|apaḥ|acCa̍|Eti|apaḥ|iṣya|hOtaḥ|iti̍|Aha|iṣitam|hi|karma̍|kriyatE̱|maitrA̍varuṇasyEti̍ maitrA̱-varuṇasya|camasAddhvaryaviti# camasa-addhvaryO|Eti|drava|iti̍|Aha|mitrAvaru̍ṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|vai|apAm|nEtArau̱|tAByA̱m|Eva|EnAḥ|acCa̍|Eti|dEvI̱ḥ|Apaḥ|apAm|napAt|iti̍|Aha|AhatyEtyA̍ - hutyA|Eva|EnAḥ|niṣkrIyEti# niḥ - krIya|gRuhṇAti|athO̍ iti|haviṣkRu̍tAnAmiti̍# haviḥ - kRutAnAm|Eva|aBiGRutAnAmityaBi̍ - GRutAnAm|gRuhṇAti|14 (50)
verses.samhita: ma ityAha̍ savitRuprasUta̍ Eva dEvatA̱ByO nivEdyApO&cCai̱tyapa iṣya̍ hOtarityAhEṣitaṃ̍ hi karma# kriyatE maitrAvaruṇasya̍ camasAddhvaryavA dravEtyAha̍ mitrAvaruṇau̍ vA apAM nEtArau tAByAmEvainA̍ acCaiti̍ dEvIrApO̍ apAM napAdityAhA&&*hutyaivainA̍# niṣkrIya# gRuhṇAtyathO# haviṣkRutAnA-mEvABiGRu̍tAnAM̍ gRuhṇAti- [ ] 14

verses.padam: - Padam kAṛṣiḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|śama̍lam|Eva|AsAm|apEti̍|plAvayati|samudrasya̍|vaḥ|akṣi̍tyai|uditi̍|nayE|iti̍|Aha|tasmA̱t|adyamA̍nAḥ|pIyamA̍nAḥ|Apa̍ḥ|na|kṣIyantE|yOni̍ḥ|vai|yajñasya̍|cAtvA̍lam|yajñaḥ|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|hOtRucamasamiti̍# hOtRu - camasam|ca|maitrAvaruṇacamasamiti# maitrAvaruṇa - camasam|ca|saṅqsparśyEti# saM - sparśya|vasatIvarI̱ḥ|vyAna̍yatIti̍# vi - Anayati|yajñasya̍|sayOnitvAyEti̍# sayOni - tvAya|athO̍ iti|svAt|Eva|EnAḥ|yOnE̱ḥ|prEti̍|janayati|addhva̍ryO̍ iti|avE̱ḥ|apA(3)ḥ|iti̍|Aha|uta̍ ( )|Im|anannamuḥ|uta|imAḥ|paśya|iti|vAva|Etat|Aha|yadi̍|agniṣṭOma̍ ityagni̍ - stOmaḥ|juhOti|yadi̍|ukthya̍ḥ|paridhAviti̍# pari - dhau|nIti|mArṣṭi|yadi̍|atirAtra̍ ityati̍ - rAtraḥ|yajuḥ|vadann̍|prEti̍|padyatE|yajñakratUnAmiti̍# yajña - kratUnAm|vyAvRuttyA̍ iti# vi - AvRuttyai||15̍ (75) (vAcO - hava# - maBiGRutAnAM̍ gahṇAtyu - ta - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍ (A3)
verses.samhita: kAṛṣirasItyA̍ha̍ śamalamEvA&&*sAmapa̍# plAvayati samudrasya vO&kṣityA̍ unnaya̍ ityAha̍ tasmAdadyamA̍nAḥ̍ pIyamAnA̍ ApO na kṣIyantE̍ yOnirvai yajñasya cAtvAlaM̍ ~MyajñO vasatIvarIr̍ḥOtRucamasaM̍ ca# maitrAvaruṇacamasaM ca# saṅqsparśya# vasatIvarIrvyAnayati̍ yajñasya# sayOnitvAyAthO svAdEvainA yOnEḥ pra janayatyaddhvaryO&vE̍rapA(3)̍ ityAhOtE̍ ( ) -manannamurutEmAḥ̍ paśyEti vAvaitadAha̍ yadyagniṣṭOmO̍ juhOti yad yukthyaḥ̍ paridhau ni mA̱rṣṭi yad yatirAtrO̍ yajurvadan pra padyatE̍ yajñakratUnAM ~MvyAvRuttyai||15̍ (vAcO-hava-maBiGRu̍tAnAM̍ gRuhṇAtyu - ta - pa~jcaviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvasya|tvA|savituḥ|prasava̍ iti# pra - savE|iti|grAvA̍ṇam|Eti̍|dattE|prasU̱tyA̍ iti pra - sUtyai|aśvinO̱ḥ|bAhuByAmiti# bAhu-ByAm|iti|Aha|aśvinau̱|hi|dEvAnA̱m|addhvaryU̍ iti|AstA̱m|pUṣṇaḥ|hastA̱ByAm|iti̍|Aha|yatyai̱|paśava̍ḥ|vai|sOma̍ḥ|vyAna̍ iti# vi - anaḥ|upAṃqśusavana̍ ityupAṃśu̍ - savanaḥ|yat|upAṃqśusava̍namityu̍pAṃśu̍ - savanam|aBIti̍|mimI̍tE|vyAnamiti̍# vi - anam|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|indrA̍ya|tvA|indrA̍ya|tvA|iti̍|mimItE|indrA̍ya|hi|sOma̍ḥ|Ahriyata̍ ityA̱ - hriyatE̱|pa~jca|kRutva̍ḥ|yaju̍ṣA|mimItE|16̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvasya# tvA savituḥ prasava̍ iti grAvAṇamA̍ dattE̍ prasU̱tyA aśvinO̱-rbAhuByAmityAhAśvinau̍ hi dEvAnAmaddhvaryU̍ AstA̱M pUṣṇO hastA̱ByAmityAha̍ yatyai# paśavO vai sOmO̱ vyAna upAṃśusava̍nO̍ yadupAṃśusava̍na-maBi̍ mimItE̍ vyAnamEva paśuṣu# dadhAtIndrAya̍ tvEndrAya̍ tvEti# mimIta indrAya̍ hi sOma# AhriyatE pa~jca kRutvO yajuṣA̍ mimItE- [ ] 16

verses.padam: - Padam pa~jcA̱kṣarEti pa~jca-akṣarA|pa~gktiḥ|pA~gkta̍ḥ|yajñaḥ|yajñam|Eva|avEti̍|rundhE|pa~jca̍|kRutva̍ḥ|tUṣṇIm|daśa̍|samiti̍|padyantE|daśA̱kṣarEti̍ daśa# - akṣarA|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|anna̱m|virAḍiti# vi - rAṭ|virAjEti# vi - rAjA̱|Eva|annAdyamityanna̍ -adya̱m|avEti|rundhE|śvAtrAḥ|stha|vRutratura̍ iti# vRutra - turaḥ|iti̍|Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|apAm|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|na|aPsvitya̍p̍ - su|Arti̱m|Eti|RucCati|yat|tE|sOma|divi|jyOti̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|EByaḥ|Eva|Enam|17̍ (50)
verses.samhita: pa~jcA̱kṣarA pa~gktiḥ pA~gktO# yajñO yajñamEvAva# rundhE pa~jca kRutvastUṣṇIM̍ daśa saM padyantE̍ daśA̱kṣarA virAḍannaM̍ ~MvirAḍ virAjaivAnnAdyamava# rundhE śvAtrAḥ stha# vRutratura ityAhaiṣa̍ vA apAṃ sOmapIthO̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda nAPsvArtimArcCati̍ yattE# sOma divi jyOtirityAhaiBya̍ EvainaM-̍ [ ] 17

verses.padam: - Padam lOkEByaḥ|samiti̍|Barati|sOma̍ḥ|vai|rAjA̱|diśa̍ḥ|aBIti̍|addhyAyat|saḥ|diśa̍ḥ|anu̍|prEti̍|aviśat|prAk|apA̱k|uda̍k|adharAk|iti̍|Aha|digBya̍ iti# dik - Byaḥ|Eva|Enam|samiti|Barati|athO̍ iti|diśa̍ḥ|Eva|asmai|avEti̍|rundhE|amba̍|nIti̍|svara|iti̍|Aha|kAmu̍kAḥ|Enam|striya̍ḥ|Bavanti|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|yat|tE|sOma|adA̱Byam|nAma̍|jAgRu̍vi|iti̍|18̍ (50)
verses.samhita: ~MlOkEByaḥ saM Barati̍ sOmO vai rAjA diśO&ByaddhyAyath̍ sa diśO&nu prAviśat̍ prAgapAgudagadharAgityA̍ha̍ digBya Evainaṃq saM BaratyathO̍ diśa# EvAsmA ava# rundhE &mba ni ṣvarEtyAha̍ kAmukA̍ Enaṅq striyO# Bavanti ya EvaM ~MvEda yat tE# sOmAdA̱ByaM nAma jAgRuvItyA-̍ [ ] 18

verses.padam: - Padam Aha|Eṣaḥ|vai|sOmasya|sOmapItha̍ iti# sOma - pIthaḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|na|saumyAm|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCati|Gnanti̍|vai|Etat|sOma̱m|yat|aBiṣuṇvantItya̍Bi̍ - sunvanti|aṃqśUn|apEti̍|gRuhṇAti|trAya̍tE|Eva|Enam|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|aṃqśavaḥ|paśava̍ḥ|sOma̍ḥ|aṃqśUn|puna̍ḥ|apIti̍|sRujati|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|paśuṣu|dadhAti|dvaudvAviti̍ dvau - dvau|apIti|sRujati|tasmA̱t|dvaudvAviti̍ dvau - dvau|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ||19 (44) (yajuṣA̍ mimIta - EnaM - jAgRuvIti - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A4)
verses.samhita: -haiṣa vai sOmasya̍ sOmapIthO ya EvaM ~MvEda na saumyAmArtimArcCati̍ Gnanti vA Etath sOmaM ~MyadaBiṣuṇvantyaṃq̍ śUnapa# gRuhṇAti trAyata̍ EvainaM̍ prAṇA vA aṃqśavaḥ̍ paśavaḥ sOmO &ṃqśUn punarapi# sRujati prAṇAnEva paśuṣu# dadhAti dvaudvAvapi# sRujati tasmAd dvaudvau̱ prAṇAḥ||19 (yajuṣA̍ mimIta - EnaM - jAgRuvIti - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇa iti# pra - anaḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|upAṃqśurityupa-aśuḥ|yat|upAṅqśva̍grA̍ ityupAṃqśu̍ - agrAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|anu|prEti̍|yanti|aruṇaḥ|ha|sma|Aha|aupa̍vEśirityaupa̍# - vEśiḥ|prAtassavana iti# prAtaḥ-savanE|Eva|aham|yajñam|samiti|sthApayAmi|tEna̍|tata̍ḥ|saṅsthi̍tEnEti̍ saM-sthitEna|carAmi|iti|aṣṭau|kRutva̍ḥ|agrE̱|aBIti̍|sunOti|aṣṭAkṣarEtyaṣṭA̍ - akṣarA|gAyatrI|gAyatram|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|prAtassavanamiti# prAtaḥ - savanam|Eva|tEna|ApnOti|EkA̍daśa|kRutva̍ḥ|dvitIya̱m|EkA̍daśAkṣarEtyEkA̍daśa-akṣarA|triṣṭup|traiṣṭu̍Bam|mAddhya̍ndinam|20̍ (50)
verses.samhita: prAṇO vA Eṣa yadupAṃqśu̍ ryadupAṅqśvagrA̍ grahA# gRuhyantE̱ prAṇamEvAnu pra yantyaruṇO̍ ha# smA&&*haupavEśiḥ̍ prAtassavana EvAhaM ~Myajñaṃ saṅ sthApayAmi̍ tEna tataḥ saṅsthitEna̍ carAmItyaṣṭau kRutvO&grE-&BiṣuṇO-tyaṣṭAkṣa̍rA̍ gAyatrI gAyatraM̍ prAtassavanaM̍ prAtassavanamEva̍ tEnA̱ &&*pnOtyEkAdaśa̍ kRutvO̱ dvitIya-mEkAdaśAkṣarA̍ triṣṭup traiṣṭuBaM̍ mAddhyadiMnaṃq-̍ [ ] 20

verses.padam: - Padam savanam|mAddhya̍ndinam|Eva|sava̍nam|tEna̍|ApnOti|dvAda̍śa|kRutva̍ḥ|tRutIya̱m|dvAda̍śAkṣarEti̍ dvAdaśa̍ - akṣarA|jagatI|jAga̍tam|tRutIyasavanamiti̍# tRutIya - savanam|tRutIyasavanamiti# tRutIya-savanam|Eva|tEna|ApnOti|EtAm|ha|vAva|saḥ|yajñasya̍|saṅsthi̍timiti̍ saM - sthitim|uvAca|askandAya|aska̍nnam|hi|tat|yat|yajñasya̍|saṅsthi̍tasyEti̍ saM - sthitasya|skandati|athO̍ iti|Kalu̍|Ahuḥ|gAyatrI|vAva|prAtassavana̍ iti# prAtaḥ - savanE|na|ativAda ityati̍ - vAdE̱|iti|ana̍tivAduka̍ ityanati̍ - vAdukaḥ|Enam|BrAtRuvyaḥ|Bavati|yaḥ|Evam|vEda̍|tasmA̱t|aṣṭAva̍ṣṭAvityaṣṭau̍ - aṣṭau|21 (50)
verses.samhita: savanaM̍ mAddhyandinamEva̍ savanaM̍ tEnA̱&&*pnOti dvAdaśa̍ kRutvastRutIyaM̍ dvAdaśAkṣarA̍ jagatI̍ jAgataM̍ tRutIyasavanaM tRutIyasavanamEva̍ tEnA̱ &&*pnOtyEtAṃ ha vAva sa yajñasya saṅsthitimuvAcA̍ skandAyAska̍nnaṃq̍ hi tad-yad-yajñasya saṅsthitasya̍ skandatyathO KalvAhurgAyatrI̍ vAva prAtassavanE̍ nAtivAda ityanativAduka̍ EnaM BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati ya EvaM ~MvEda tasmAdaṣṭAva̍ṣṭau-̍ [ ] 21

verses.padam: - Padam kRutvaḥ|aBiṣutyamitya̍Bi-sutya̱m|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|pavitra̍vanta̍ iti# pavitra# - vantaḥ|anyE|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|kimpavitra̍ iti kim - pavitraḥ|upAṃqśurityupa̍ - aṃqśuḥ|iti|vAkpa̍vitra̍ iti vAk-pavitra ḥ|iti|brUyAt|vAcaḥ|pata̍yE|pavasva|vAjinn|iti̍|Aha|vAcA|Eva|Enam|pavayati|vRuṣa̍ḥ|aṃqśuByAmityaṃqśu̍ - ByAm|iti|Aha|vRuṣṇa̍ḥ|hi|Etau|aṃqśU̍ iti|yau|sOma̍sya|gaBa̍stipUta̍ iti gaBasti̍ - pUtaḥ|iti|Aha|gaBa̍stinA|hi|Enam|pavaya̍ti|dEvaḥ|dEvAnA̱m|pavitra̱m|asi|iti̍|Aha|dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|22̍ (50)
verses.samhita: kRutvO&Biṣutya̍M̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti pavitravantO&nyE̍ grahA# gRuhyantE kiMpavitra̍ upAṃqśuriti vAkpavitra̍ iti# brUyAd-vAcaspatayE̍ pavasva vAjinnityAha̍ vAcaivainaM̍ pavayati vRuṣṇO# aṃqśuByAmityAha̍ vRuṣṇO hyEtAvaṃqśU̍ yau sOmasya̍ gaBastipUta̍ ityAha̍ gaBastinA̍ hyEnaM̍ pavayati̍ dEvO dEvAnA̱M pavitramasItyA̍ha̍ dEvO hyEṣa-̍ [ ] 22

verses.padam: - Padam sann|dEvAnA̱m|pavitra̱m|yEṣA̱m|BAgaḥ|asi|tEBya̍ḥ|tvA|iti̍|Aha|yEṣA̱m|hi|Eṣaḥ|BAgaḥ|tEBya̍ḥ|Enam|gRuhṇAti̍|svA~gkRu̍taḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|svam|akRuta|madhumatIriti̍ madhu# - matIḥ|naḥ|iṣaḥ|kRudhi|iti̍|Aha|sarva̱m|Eva|asmai|idam|svadayati|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|indriyEBya̍ḥ|divyEBya̍ḥ|pArthi̍vEByaḥ|iti̍|Aha|uBayE̍ṣu|Eva|dEvamanuṣyEṣviti̍# dEva - manuṣyEṣu|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|dadhAti|manaḥ|tvA|23̍ (50)
verses.samhita: san dEvAnA̱M pavitraM ~MyEṣA̱M BAgO&si tEByastvEtyAha̍ yEṣAṅq hyEṣa̍ BAgastEBya# EnaM gRuhṇAti svAM kRutO&sItyA̍ha̍ prAṇamEva svamakRuta̍ madhumatIrna̍ iṣaskRudhItyA̍ha̍ sarvamEvAsmA̍# idaṅ svadayati̍ viśvE̱Bya-stvEndriyEByO# divyEByaḥ pArthivEBya̍ ityAhOBayE̱ṣvEva̍ dEvamanuṣyEṣu̍# prAṇAn dadhAti̍ manastvA-̍ [ ] 23

verses.padam: - Padam aṣṭu|iti|Aha|mana̍ḥ|Eva|AśnutE|uru|antari̍kṣam|anviti̍|ihi|iti̍|Aha|antarikṣadEvatya̍# ityantarikṣa-dEvatya̍ḥ|hi|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|svAhA̱|tvA|suBava iti# su - Bavaḥ|sUryAya|iti̍|Aha|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|svaBavasa̍ iti sva - Bavasaḥ|dEvAḥ|tEṣu|Eva|parOkṣamiti̍# paraḥ - akṣa̱m|juhOti|dEvEByaḥ|tvA|marIcipEBya̍ iti# marIci - pEByaḥ|iti̍|Aha|Adityasya̍|vai|raśmaya̍ḥ|dEvAḥ|marIcipA̍ iti# marIci-pAḥ|tEṣA̱m|tat|BAgadhEyamiti# BAga-dhEya̱m|tAn|Eva|tEna|prIṇAti|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|vaṛṣu̍kaḥ|parjanya̍ḥ|24̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &ṣṭvityAha̍ mana# EvAśnuta̍ urvantari̍kṣa-manvihItyA̍hA-ntarikṣadEvatyO̍# hi prAṇaḥ svAhA̱ tvA suBavaḥ sUryAyEtyAha̍ prAṇA vai svaBavasO̍ dEvAstEṣvEva parOkṣaM̍ juhOti dEvEByastvA̍ marIcipEBya ityAhA̍ &&*dityasya vai raśmayO# dEvA marIcipAstEṣAM̍ tad BAgadhEyaM̍ tAnEva tEna# prIṇAti yadi# kAmayEta̍ vaṛṣukaḥ̍ parjanyaḥ-̍ [ ] 24

verses.padam: - Padam syAt|iti|nIcA̱|hastE̍na|nIti̍|mRujyAt|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|nIti̍|yacCati|yadi̍|kAmayE̍ta|ava̍ṛṣukaḥ|syAt|iti̍|uttAnEnEtyu̍t̍ - tAnEna|nIti̍|mRujyAt|vRuṣṭi̱m|Eva|uditi̍|yacCati|yadi̍|aBicarEditya̍Bi̍ - carE̱t|amum|jahi|atha|tvA|hOṣyAmi|iti̍|brUyAt|Ahu̍timityA̍ - hutim|Eva|Enam|prEPsanniti# pra-IPsann|hanti|yadi|dUrE|syAt|Eti̍|tami̍tOḥ|tiṣṭhEt|prAṇamiti̍# pra - anam|Eva|asya|anugatyEtyanu̍ - gatya|hanti|yadi̍|aBicarEditya̍Bi̍ - carE̱t|amuṣya|25̍ (50)
verses.samhita: syAditi nIcA hastEna̍ ni mRujyAd-vRuṣṭi̍mEva̍ ni yacCati̍ yadi# kAmayEtAvaṛṣukaḥ̍ syAdityuttAnEna̍ ni mRujyAd-vRuṣṭi̍mEvOd-ya̍cCati̍ yadyaBicarE̍damuM̍ jahyatha# tvA hOṣyAmIti# brUyAdAhutimEvaina̍M̍ prEPsan. hanti̍ yadi# dUrE syAdA tamitOstiṣṭhEt̍ prAṇamEvAsyAnugatya̍# hanti yadyaBicarE̍damuṣya̍-̍ [ ] 25

verses.padam: - Padam tvA|prAṇa iti# pra - anE|sAdayAmi|iti|sAdayEt|asa̍nnaḥ|vai|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|prAṇamiti# pra - anam|Eva|asya|sAdayati|ṣaḍBiriti# ṣaṭ - Biḥ|aṃqśuBirityaṃqśu - Biḥ|pavayati|ṣaṭ|vai|Rutavaḥ|RutuBirityRutu̍ - Biḥ|Eva|Enam|pavayati|triḥ|pavayati|trayaḥ|imE|lOkAḥ|EBiḥ|Eva|Enam|lOkaiḥ|pavayati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma-vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|traya̍ḥ|paśUnAm|hastA̍dAnA̍ iti hasta# -AdAnAḥ|iti|yat|triḥ|upAṃqśumityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśum|hastEna|vigRuhṇAtIti̍# vi - gRuhṇAti|tasmA̱t|traya̍ḥ|paśUnAm|hastA̍dAnA̍ iti hasta# - AdAnAḥ|puruṣaḥ̍ ( )|hastI|markaṭaḥ||26̍ (52)
verses.samhita: tvA prAṇE sAdayAmIti̍# sAdayEdasannO̍ vai prAṇaḥ prAṇamEvAsya# sAdayati ṣaḍBiraṃqśuBiḥ̍ pavayati ṣaḍ vA Rutava# RutuBirEvaina̍M̍ pavayati triḥ pavayati̍ traya# imE lOkA EBirEvainaM̍ ~MlOkaiḥ pavayati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAt trayaḥ̍ paśUnAṃ hastAdAnA̍ iti yat trirupAṃq̍ śuṃ hastEna̍ vigRuhṇAti tasmAt trayaḥ̍ paśUnAṃ hastAdAnAḥ̍ puruṣO̍ ( ) hastI markaṭaḥ||26̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|upAṃqśAvityu̍pa̍ - aṃqśau|yajñam|saṅqsthApyamiti# saM - sthApya̱m|apaśyann|tam|upAṃqśAvityupa̍ - aṃqśau|samiti|asthApayann|tE|asu̍rAḥ|vajra̱m|udyatyEtyu̍t̍ - yatya|dEvAn|aBIti̍|Ayanta|tE|dEvAḥ|biBya̍taḥ|indra̱m|upEti̍|adhAvann|tAn|indra̍ḥ|antaryAmEṇEtya̍ntaḥ̍ - yAmEna|antaḥ|adhatta|tat|antaryAmasyEtya̍ntaḥ̍ - yAmasya|antaryAmatvamitya̍ntaryAma̍ - tvam|yat|antaryAma ityantaḥ-yAmaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|BrAtRu̍vyAn|Eva|tat|yaja̍mAnaḥ|antaḥ|dhattE|antaḥ|tE|27̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yad yajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA upAṃqśau̍ yajñaṃ saṅqsthApyamapaśyan̍ tamupAṃqśau̍ samasthApayan̍ tE&surA̍ vajramudyatya̍# dEvAnaByAyanta̍ tE dEvA biByata̍ indramupAdhAvan̍ tAnindrO̱&ntaryAmEṇAntaradhatta̍ tadantaryAmasyA̱ntaryAmatvaM̍ ~MyadantaryAmO̍ gRuhyatE BrAtRuvyAnEva̍ tad yajamAnO&ntarddha̍ttE̍ &ntastE-̍ [ ] 27

verses.padam: - Padam dadhAmi|dyAvApRuthivI̍ iti dyAvA̱ - pRuthivI|antaḥ|uru|antarikṣam|iti̍|Aha|EBiḥ|Eva|lOkaiḥ|yaja̍mAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|antaḥ|dhattE|tE|dEvAḥ|amanyanta|indra̍ḥ|vai|idam|aBUt|yat|vayam|smaḥ|iti̍|tE|abruvann|maGa̍vanniti̍ maGa# - vann|anviti|naḥ|Eti̍|Baja|iti̍|sajOṣA̍ iti# sa - jOṣA̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|avaraiḥ|parai̱ḥ|ca|iti̍|abravIt|yE|ca|Eva|dEvAḥ|parE̱|yE|ca|ava̍rE|tAn|uBayAn̍|28̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dadhAmi dyAvApRuthivI̍ antaru-rvantari̍kṣa-mityA̍haiBirEva̍ lOkairyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAnantarddha̍ttE̍ tE dEvA amanyantEndrO̍ vA idamaBUdyad̍ vayaṅ sma iti tE̱&bruvan maGavannanu̍# na A BajEti# sajOṣA# dEvairavaraiḥ̍ paraiścEtyabravIdyE̍ caiva dEvAḥ parE yE cAvarE̍ tAnuBayA-̍ [ ] 28

verses.padam: - Padam anvABajaditya̍nu̍ - ABajat|sajOṣA̍ iti# sa - jOṣA̱ḥ|dEvaiḥ|avaraiḥ|parai̱ḥ|ca|iti̍|Aha|yE|ca|Eva|dEvAḥ|parE̱|yE|ca|ava̍rE|tAn|uBayAn̍|anvABa̍jatItya̍nu-̍ ABajati|antaryAma̍ ityantaḥ̍ - yAmE|maGavanniti# maGa - vann|mAdayasva|iti|Aha|yajñAt|Eva|yaja̍mAnam|na|antaḥ|Eti|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma-gRuhItaḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|apAnasyEtya̍pa̍ - anasya|dhRutyai̱|yat|uBau|apavitrau|gRuhyEyA̍tAm|prAṇamiti̍# pra-anam|apAna ityapa̍ - anaḥ|anu|nIti̍|RucCEt|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra-mAyukaḥ|syAt|pavitra̍vAniti̍# pavitra# - vAn|antaryAma ityantaḥ̍ - yAmaḥ|gRuhyatE|29 (50)
verses.samhita: nanvABajath̍ sajOṣA# dEvairavaraiḥ̍ paraiścEtyAha̍ yE caiva dEvAḥ parE yE cAvarE̍ tAnuBayA-nanvABa̍ja-tyantaryAmE̍ maGavan̍ mAdayasvEtyAha̍ yajñAdEva yajamAnaM̍ nAntarE̱tyupayAma-gRuhItO̍ &sItyAhApAnasya̍ dhRutyai yaduBAvapavitrau̍ gRuhyEyAtAM̍ prAṇamapAnO&nu̍ nyRucCEt̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAt pavitravAnantaryAmO̍ gRuhyatE-̍ [ ] 29

verses.padam: - Padam prAṇApAnayOriti# prAṇa - apAnayO̱ḥ|vidhRutyA̍ iti vi - dhRutyai|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa - apAnau|vai|Etau|yat|upAṅqśvantaryAmAvityupAṃśu̍ - antaryAmau|vyAna iti# vi - anaḥ|upAṃqśusavana̍ ityupAṃśu̍ - savanaḥ|yam|kAmayE̍ta|pramAyu̍ka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|iti̍|asaṅ̍spRuṣṭAvityasa̱M̍ - spRuṣṭau|tasya|sAdayEt|vyAnEnEti̍# vi - anEna|Eva|asya|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|vIti|Cinatti|tAjak|prEti̍|mIyatE|yam|kAmayE̍ta|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|iyAt|iti̍|saṅspRu̍ṣṭAviti̍ saM-spRuṣṭau|tasya|sAdayEt|vyAnEnEti̍# vi-anEna|Eva|asya|prAṇApAnAviti̍# prAṇa - apAnau|samiti|tanOti|sarva̱m|Ayu̍ḥ|Eti||30̍ (44) (ta - uBayA̱n - gRuhyatE - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A6)
verses.samhita: prAṇApAnayO-rvidhRutyai̍ prAṇApAnau vA Etau yadupAṅśvantaryAmau̍ vyAna upAṃśu̍ savanO̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAdityasaṅ# spRuṣṭau tasya# sAdayEd-vyAnEnaivAsya# prAṇApAnau vi cCinatti̍ tAjak pra mIyatE̍ yaM kAmayEta̍ sarvamAyuriyAditi̍ saṅ spRuṣṭau̍ tasya# sAdayEd-vyAnEnaivAsya# prAṇApAnau saM tanOti̍ sarvamAyurEti||30̍ (ta - uBayA̱n - gRuhyatE - catuścatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam vAk|vai|EṣA|yat|aindravAyava ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|yat|aindravAyavAgrA ityai̱ndravAyava - agrAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|vAca̱m|Eva|anu|prEti̍|yanti|vAyum|dEvAḥ|abruvann|sOma̱m|rAjA̍nam|hanAma|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|mada̍grA̍ iti mat - agrAḥ|Eva|vaḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyAntai|iti|tasmA̱t|aindravAyavAgrA̍ ityai̱ndravAyava - agrAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE|tam|aGnann|saḥ|apUyat|tam|dEvAḥ|na|upEti|adhRuṣṇuvann|tE|vAyum|abruvann|imam|naḥ|svadaya|31̍ (50)
verses.samhita: vAgvA EṣA yadai̱ndravAyavO yadai̱ndravAyavAgrA grahA# gRuhyantE vAcamEvAnu̍ pra yanti̍ vAyuM dEvA abruvanth̍ sOmaṃq rAjAnaṃ̍ hanAmEti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai madagrA̍ Eva vO grahA# gRuhyAntA iti tasmAdaindravAyavAgrA̍ grahA# gRuhyantE tamaGnanth̍ sO&pUyat̍ taM dEvA nOpAdhRuṣṇuvan̍ tE vA yumabruvannimaM̍ naḥ̍ svadayE- [ ] 31

verses.padam: - Padam iti|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|maddEvatyA̍nIti̍# mat-dEvatyAni|Eva|vaḥ|pAtrA̍ṇi|ucyAntai|iti̍|tasmA̱t|nAnAdEvatyA̍nIti̍# nAnA - dEvatyAni|santi̍|vAyavyA̍ni|ucyantE|tam|EByaḥ|vAyuḥ|Eva|asvadayat|tasmA̱t|yat|pUya̍ti|tat|pravAta̍ iti# pra - vAtE|vIti|sajanti|vAyuḥ|hi|tasya̍|pavayitA|svadayitA|tasya̍|vigraha̍ṇamiti̍# vi - grahaṇam|na|avindann|sA|adi̍tiḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|atha̍|mayA̱|vIti̍|gRuhṇIddhvam|maddEvatyA̍# iti# mat - dEvatyA̱ḥ|Eva|vaḥ|sOmA̱ḥ|32 (50)
verses.samhita: -ti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai maddEvatyA̱nyEva vaḥ pAtrA̱ṇyucyAntA iti tasmA̱nnAnAdEvatyAni̍ santi# vAyavyA̱nyucyantE tamE̱ByO vAyurEvAsvadayat̍ tasmAdyat pUyati̍ tat pravAtE̍ vi ṣajanti̍ vAyuṛhi tasya# pavayitA svadayitA̍ tasya# vigrahaṇaM̍ nAvindanth̍ sAditirabravId̍ varaM̍ ~MvRuṇA atha mayA vi gRuhṇIddhvaM̍ maddEvatyA# Eva vaḥ sOmA̱ḥ - [ ] 32

verses.padam: - Padam sannAḥ|asann|iti|upayAmagRu̍hIta̍ ityupayAma-gRuhItaḥ|asi|iti̍|Aha|aditidEvatyA̍# ityaditi̍ - dEvatyA̱ḥ|tEna|yAni̍|hi|dArumayAṇIti̍# dAru-mayAni|pAtrA̍ṇi|asyai|tAni̍|yOnE̱ḥ|saMBU̍tAnIti̍ saM - BUtAni|yAni|mRunmayAnIti̍# mRut - mayAni|sAkṣAditi̍# sa - akṣAt|tAni|asyai|tasmA̱t|Evam|Aha|vAk|vai|parA̍cI|avyA̍kRutEtyavi̍# - AkRutA|avadat|tE|dEvAḥ|indra̱m|abruvann|imAm|naḥ|vAca̱m|vyAkurviti# vi - Akuru|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|mahya̱m|ca|Eva|Eṣaḥ|vAyavE̱|ca|saha̍ ( )|gRuhyAtai|iti|tasmA̱t|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ|saha|gRuhyatE|tAm|indraḥ|maddhyataḥ|avakramyEtya̍va̍ - kramya|vyAka̍rOditi̍# vi - AkarOt|tasmA̱t|iyam|vyAkRutEti̍# vi-AkRutA|vAk|udyatE|tasmA̱t|sakRut|indrA̍ya|maddhyataḥ|gRuhyatE|dviḥ|vAyavE̱|dvau|hi|saḥ|varau̱|avRu̍ṇIta||33̍ (78) (svadaya - sOmA̱ḥ - sahA - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A7)
verses.samhita: sannA asa-nnityu̍payAmagRu̍hItO&sI-tyA̍hA-ditidEvatyA̱stEna̍ yAni hi dArumayA̍ṇi̍ pAtrA̱ṇyasyai tAni yOnEḥ saMBUtAni̍ yAni# mRunmayAni̍ sAkṣAt tAnyasyai tasmAdEvamA̍ha̍ vAgvai parAcya- vyAkRutA&vadat̍ tE dEvA indramabruvannimAM̍ nO vAcaM ~MvyAkurviti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai mahyaM̍ caivaiṣa vAyavE# ca saha ( ) gRuhyAtA̍ iti tasmAdaindravAyavaḥ̍ saha gRuhyatE̍ tAmindrO# maddhyatO&vakramya̍ vyAkarOt̍ tasmAdiyaM̍ ~MvyAkRutA̍ vAgudyatE̍ tasmA̱th sakRudindrAya̍ maddhyatO gRuhyatE̍ dvirvAyavE dvau hi sa varAvavRuṇIta||33̍ (svadaya - sOmA̱ḥ - sahA - ṣṭAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam mitram|dEvAḥ|abruvann|sOma̱m|rAjAnam|hanAma|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|na|aham|sarva̍sya|vai|aham|mitram|asmi|iti̍|tam|abruvann|hanA̍ma|Eva|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|paya̍sA|Eva|mE|sOma̱m|śrIṇann|iti̍|tasmA̱t|maitrAvaruṇamiti̍# maitrA - varuṇam|payasA|śrIṇanti|tasmA̱t|paśava̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmann|mitraḥ|sann|krUram|akaḥ|iti̍|krUram|iva|Kalu̍|vai|Eṣaḥ|34̍ (50)
verses.samhita: mitraM dEvA abruvanth̍ sOmaṃq rAjAnaṃ̍ hanAmEti sO̱&bravInnAhaṃ sarvasya̍ vA ahaM mitramasmIti tamabruvanq.̍ hanAmaivEti̍ sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai payasaiva̍ mE sOmaṅ# śrIṇanniti tasmA̱n-maitrAvaruṇaM payasA̍ śrIṇanti tasmA̱t paśavO&pA̱krAman mitraḥ san krUramakariti̍# krUramiva̍ Kalu vA Eṣaḥ - [ ] 34

verses.padam: - Padam karOti|yaḥ|sOmEna|yaja̍tE|tasmA̱t|paśava̍ḥ|apEti̍|krAmanti|yat|maitrAvaruṇamiti̍# maitrA-varuṇam|payasA|śrIṇAti̍|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|Eva|tat|mitram|samad^^rdhayatIti# saM - ad^^rdhayati|paśuBiriti̍# paśu - Biḥ|yajamAnam|purA|Kalu̍|vAva|Evam|mitraḥ|avEt|apEti̍|mat|krUram|cakruṣa̍ḥ|paśava̍ḥ|kramiṣyanti|iti̍|tasmA̱t|Evam|avRuṇIta|varu̍ṇam|dEvAḥ|abruvann|tvayA̱|aṃqśaBuvEtyaṃ̍śa̍ - BuvA̱|sOma̱m|rAjAnam|hanAma|iti̍|saḥ|abravIt|vara̱m|vRuṇai|mahya̱m|ca|35̍ (50)
verses.samhita: karOti̍ yaḥ sOmEna̍ yajatE̍ tasmA̱t paśavO&pa# krAmanti yanmai̱trAvaruṇaM payasA̍ śrIṇAti# paśuBirEva̍ tanmitraṃ samarddhaya̍ti̍ paśuBiryajamAnaM̍ purA Kalu vAvaivaM mitrO&vEdapa̍ mat krUraM cakruṣaḥ̍ paśavaḥ̍ kramiṣyantIti tasmAdEvama̍vRuṇIta̍ varuṇaM̍ dEvA abruvan̍ tvayA&ṃśaBuvA̍ sOmaṃq rAjAnaṃ̍ hanAmEti sO̱&bravId varaM̍ ~MvRuṇai mahyaM̍ cai- [ ] 35

verses.padam: - Padam Eva|Eṣaḥ|mitrAya|ca|saha|gRuhyAtai|iti̍|tasmA̱t|maitrAvaruṇa̍ iti# maitrA - varuṇaḥ|saha|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|rAjñA̱|rAjAnam|aṃqśaBuvEtyaṃ̍śa̍ - BuvA̱|Gnanti|vaiśyEna|vaiśya̱m|śUdrEṇa̍|śUdram|na|vai|idam|divA̱|na|nakta̱m|AsIt|avyA̍vRuttamityavi̍# - AvRuttam|tE|dEvAḥ|mitrAvaruṇAviti̍# mitrA - varuṇau|abruvann|idam|naḥ|vIti̍|vAsayatam|iti̍|tau|abrUtAm|vara̱m|vRuṇAvahai|Eka̍ḥ|Eva|Avat|pUrva̍ḥ|graha̍ḥ|gRuhyAtai|iti̍|tasmA̱t|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra - vAyavaḥ ( )|pUrvaḥ|maitrAvaruṇAditi̍# maitrA - varuṇAt|gRuhyatE|prAṇApAnAviti# prAṇa - apAnau|hi|Etau|yat|upAṅqśvantaryAmAvityupAṃśu-antaryAmau|mitraḥ|aha̍ḥ|aja̍nayat|varu̍ṇaḥ|rAtri̱m|tata̍ḥ|vai|idam|vIti̍|aucCat|yat|maitrAvaruṇa̍ iti# maitrA-varuṇaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|vyuṣṭyA̍ iti vi - uṣṭyai||36 (72) (Eṣa - cai̱ - ndravAyavO - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍ (A8)
verses.samhita: vaiṣa mitrAya# ca saha gRuhyAtA̍ iti tasmA̱nmaitrAvaruṇaḥ saha gRuhyatE̍ tasmAd rAjñA rAjAnamaṃśaBuvA̱̍ Gnanti vaiśyEna̍ vaiśyaṃ# śUdrEṇa# śUdraM na vA idaM divA na naktamAsIdavyA̍vRuttaM̍ tE dEvA mitrAvaruṇAvabruvannidaM̍ nO vivAsayatamiti̍ tAvabrUtAM̍ ~MvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇAvahA Eka# EvA&&*vat pUrvO grahO# gRuhyAtA iti tasmAdaindravAyavaḥ̍ ( ) pUrvO# maitrAvaruṇAd-gRuhyatE̍ prAṇApAnau hyEtau̍ yadupAṅ-śvantaryAmau̍ mitrO&harajanayad-varu̍ṇO̍ rAtriM tatO vA idaM ~Mvyau̱cCadyan-mai̱trAvaruṇO gRuhyatE vyuṣṭyai||36̍ (Eṣa - cai̱ - ndravAyavO - dvAviṃśatiśca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam yajñasya|śira̍ḥ|acCidyata|tE|dEvAḥ|aśvinau̱|abruvann|Biṣajau̱|vai|sthaḥ|idam|yajñasya̍|śira̍ḥ|pratIti̍|dhattam|iti̍|tau|abrUtAm|vara̱m|vRuṇAvahai|graha̍ḥ|Eva|nau|atra̍|apIti̍|gRuhyatAm|iti̍|tAByA̱m|Etam|Aśvinam|agRuhṇann|tata̍ḥ|vai|tau|yajñasya̍|śira̍ḥ|pratIti̍|adhattAm|yat|Aśvinaḥ|gRuhyatE̱|yajñasya̍|niṣkRu̍tyA̍ iti niḥ - kRutyai|tau|dEvAḥ|abruvann|apUtau|vai|imau|manuṣyacarAviti̍# manuṣya - carau|37 (50)
verses.samhita: yajñasya śirO̱&cCidyata tE dEvA aśvinAvabruvan̍ Biṣajau vai stha# idaM ~Myajñasya śiraḥ prati# dhattamiti tAvabrUtAM̍ ~MvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇAvahai graha# Eva nAvatrApi# gRuhyatAmiti tAByA-mEtamA̱śvina-ma̍gRuhṇan̍ tatO vai tau yajñasya śiraḥ pratyadhattAM̍ ~MyadA̱śvinO gRuhyatE# yajñasya niṣkRutyai̍ tau dEvA abruvannapU̍tau̍ vA imau manuṣyacarau-̍ [ ] 37

verses.padam: - Padam Biṣajau̱|iti|tasmA̱t|brAhmaṇEna̍|BEṣajam|na|kArya̱m|apU̍taḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|amEddhyaḥ|yaḥ|Biṣak|tau|bahiṣpavamAnEnEti̍# bahiḥ - pavamAnEna|pavayitvA|tAByA̱m|Etam|Aśvinam|agRuhṇann|tasmA̱t|bahiṣpavamAna̍ iti# bahiḥ-pavamAnE|stutE|Aśvinaḥ|gRuhyatE|tasmA̱t|Evam|viduṣA̱|bahiṣpavamAna iti# bahiḥ - pavamAnaḥ|upasadya ityupa̍ - sadyaḥ|pavitra̱m|vai|bahiṣpavamAna̍ iti# bahiḥ - pavamAnaḥ|AtmAna̱m|Eva|pavayatE|tayO̱ḥ|trEdhA|Baiṣajyam|vi|nIti̍|adadhuḥ|agnau|tRutI̍yam|aPsvitya̍p-su|tRutI̍yam|brAhmaṇE|tRutI̍yam|tasmA̱t|udapAtramityu̍da̍ - pAtram|38 (50)
verses.samhita: BiṣajAviti tasmA̱d brAhmaṇEna# BEṣajaM na kAryamapU̍tO̍ hyE̱(1q)ṣO# &mEddhyO yO Biṣaktau bahiṣpavamAnEna̍# pavayitvA tAByA-mEtamA̱śvina-ma̍gRuhṇan̍ tasmA̱d bahiṣpavamAnE stuta A̱śvinO gRuhyatE̍ tasmAdEvaM̍ ~MviduṣA# bahiṣpavamAna upasadya̍ḥ̍ pavitraM ~Mvai bahiṣpavamAna̍ AtmAnamEva̍ pavayatE̍ tayO̱&strEdhA BaiṣajyaM̍ ~Mvi nyadadhuragnau̍ tRutIyamaPsu̍ tRutIyaM̍ brAhmaṇE tRutIyaM̍ tasmAdudapAtra-̍ [ ] 38

verses.padam: - Padam upanidhAyEtyupa̍ - nidhAya|brAhmaṇam|dakṣiṇataḥ|niṣAdyEti̍# ni - sAdya|BEṣajam|kuryAt|yAva̍t|Eva|BEṣajam|tEna̍|karOti|samad^^rdhu̍kamiti̍# saM - ad^^rdhukam|asya|kRutam|Bavati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|Eka̍pAtrA̍ ityEka# - pAtrAḥ|dvidEvatyA# iti# dvi-dEvatyA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|dvipAtrA iti# dvi - pAtrA̱ḥ|hUyantE|iti|yat|Eka̍pAtrA̍ ityEka# - pAtrAḥ|gRuhyantE̱|tasmA̱t|Ekaḥ|antarataḥ|prAṇa̍ iti# pra - anaḥ|dvipAtrA iti# dvi - pAtrA̱ḥ|hUyantE|tasmA̱t|dvaudvAviti dvau - dvau|bahiṣṭA̱t|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|prAṇA iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|EtE|yat|dvidEvatyA# iti# dvi - dEvatyA̱ḥ|paśavaḥ|iḍA̱|yat|iḍA̱m|pUrvA̱m|dvidEvatyE̱Bya̍ iti# dvi - dEvatyE̱Byaḥ|upahvayEtEtyupa̍ - hvayEta|39̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -mupanidhAya̍# brAhmaṇaM dakṣiṇatO̍ niṣAdya# BEṣajaM kuryAd̍ yAvadEva̍ BEṣajaM̍ tEna# karOti samarddhukamasya̍ kRutaM Bavati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAdEkapAtrA̍ dvidEvatyA# gRuhyantE̱ dvipAtrA# hUyanta iti yadEkapAtrA̍ gRuhyantE tasmAdEkO̱&ntarataḥ prAṇO dvipAtrA# hUyantE tasmAd dvaudvau# bahiṣṭA̱t prAṇAḥ prAṇA vA EtE yad dvidEvatyA̱ḥ̍ paśava iḍA yadiḍAM pUrvA̱M dvidEvatyE̱Bya upahvayEta-̍ [ ] 39

verses.padam: - Padam paśuBiriti# paśu - Biḥ|prAṇAniti# pra-anAn|antaḥ|dadhIta|pramAyuka̍ iti# pra - mAyukaḥ|syAt|dvidEvatyA̍niti̍# dvi-dEvatyAn|BakṣayitvA|iḍA̱m|upEti̍|hvayatE|prAṇAniti̍# pra - anAn|Eva|Atmann|dhitvA|paśUn|upEti|hvayatE|vAk|vai|aindravAyava̍ ityai̱ndra-vAyavaḥ|cakṣuḥ|maitrAvaruṇa̍ iti# maitrA-varuṇaḥ|śrOtra̱m|Aśvinaḥ|purastA̱t|aindravAyavamityai̱ndra - vAyavam|Bakṣayati|tasmA̱t|purastA̱t|vAcA|vadati|purastA̱t|maitrAvaruṇamiti# maitrA - varuṇam|tasmA̱t|purastA̱t|cakṣuṣA|paśyati|sarvata̍ḥ|parihAramiti̍# pari-hAra̱m|Aśvinam|tasmA̱t|sarvataḥ|śrOtrE̍ṇa|śRuṇOti|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|vai|EtE|yat|dvidEvatyA# iti# dvi - dEvatyA̱ḥ|40 (50)
verses.samhita: paśuBiḥ̍ prAṇAnantardadhIta̍ pramAyukaḥ̍ syAd dvidEvatyA̱n BakṣayitvEḍAmupa# hvayatE prAṇAnEvA&&*tman dhitvA paśUnupa# hvayatE vAgvA ai̱ndravAyavaścakṣu-rmaitrAvaruṇaḥ̍ śrOtramAśvinaḥ̍ purastAdaindravAyavaM̍ Bakṣayati̍ tasmA̱t purastA̱d vAcA vadati̍ purastA̱nmaitrAvaruṇaM tasmA̱t purastAccakṣuṣA̍ paśyati sarvataḥ̍ parihAramAśvinaM̍ tasmA̱th sarvataḥ śrOtrEṇa̍ śRuṇOti prAṇA vA EtE yad dvidEvatyA̍-̍ [ ] 40

verses.padam: - Padam ariktAni|pAtrA̍ṇi|sAdayati|tasmA̱t|ari̍ktAḥ|antarataḥ|prAṇA̍ iti# pra - anAḥ|yataḥ|Kalu̍|vai|yajñasya̍|vita̍tasyEti̍ vi - tatasya|na|kriyatE̱|tat|anviti|yajñam|rakṣAṃ̍si|avEti̍|caranti|yat|ari̍ktAni|pAtrA̍ṇi|sAdaya̍ti|kriyamA̍ṇam|Eva|tat|yajñasya̍|śayE|rakṣa̍sAm|ana̍nvavacArAyEtyana̍nu̍ - avacArAya|dakṣiṇasya|havid^^rdhAnasyEti̍# haviḥ - dhAnasya|utta̍rasyAmityut̍ - tarasyAm|vartanyAm|sAdayati|vAci|Eva|vAca̱m|dadhAti|Eti|tRutIyasavanAditi̍# tRutIya - savanAt|parIti|śErE|yajñasya̍|santa̍tyA̍ iti saM - tatyai||41 (46) (manuṣyacarA - vudapAtra̍ - mupahvayE̍ta̍ - dvidEvatyA̱ḥ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍ (A9)
verses.samhita: ariktAni̍ pAtrAṇi̍ sAdayati tasmAdariktA̍ antarataḥ prAṇA yataḥ Kalu vai yajñasya vitatasya̍ na kriyatE tadanu# yajñaṃ rakṣAṅqsyava# caranti yadariktAni̍ pAtrAṇi̍ sAdayati̍ kriyamAṇamEva̍ tad yajñasya# śayE rakṣasA̍ -mananvavacArAya̍ dakṣiṇasya̍ havirddhAnasyOttarasyAM̍ ~MvartanyAṃ sAdayati̍ vAcyEva̍ vAcaM̍ dadhAtyA tRutIyasavanAt̍ pari# śErE yajñasya santatyai||41̍ (manuṣyacarA - vudapAtra̍ - mupahvayE̍ta̍ - dvidEvatyA̱ḥ - ṣaṭcatvAriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam bRuhaspatiḥ|dEvAnA̱m|purOhi̍ta̍ iti# puraḥ - hitaḥ|AsI̱t|śaṇḍAmarkAviti śaṇḍA̱ - markau̱|asurAṇAm|brahma̍ṇvanta̍ iti brahmaṇṇ# - vantaḥ|dEvAḥ|Asann|brahma̍ṇvanta̍ iti brahmaṇṇ# - vantaḥ|asurAḥ|tE|anyaḥ|anyam|na|aśaknuvann|aBiBa̍vitumityaBi̍ - Bavitum|tE|dEvAḥ|śaṇḍAmarkAviti śaṇḍA̱ - markau̱|upEti|amantrayanta|tau|abrUtAm|vara̱m|vRuṇAvahai|grahau̱|Eva|nau|atra̍|apIti̍|gRuhyEtAm|iti̍|tAByA̱m|Etau|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|agRuhṇann|tataḥ|dEvAḥ|aBa̍vann|parEti̍|asu̍rAḥ|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|gRuhyEtE iti|Bava̍ti|AtmanA̱|parEti̍|42̍ (50)
verses.samhita: bRuhaspatirdEvAnA̱M̍ purOhita̍ AsI-cCaṇḍAmarkA-vasurAṇAM̍ brahmaṇ̍ vantO dEvA Asan brahmaṇ̍ vantO&surAstE̱(1q)̍ &nyO̱&nyaM nAśaknuva-nnaBiBa̍vituM̍ tE dEvAḥ śaṇḍAmarkA-vupAmantrayanta̍ tA vabrUtAM̍ ~MvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇAvahai grahAvEva̍ nAvatrApi# gRuhyEtAmiti tAByAmEtau̍ śukrAmanthinA-vagRuhṇan̍ tatO# dEvA aBavan̍ parA&surA̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣaḥ̍ śukrAmanthinau# gRuhyEtE BavatyAtmanA̍ parA̱- [ ] 42

verses.padam: - Padam asya|BrAtRuvyaḥ|Bavati|tau|dEvAḥ|apanudyEtya̍pa̍ - nudya|AtmanE̱|indrA̍ya|ajuhavuḥ|apa̍nuttAvityapa̍# - nuttau|śaṇḍAmarkAviti śaṇḍA̱ - markau̱|saha|amunA̱|iti|brUyAt|yam|dviṣyAt|yam|Eva|dvEṣṭi̍|tEna̍|EnA|saha|apEti̍|nudatE|saḥ|prathamaḥ|saMkRu̍tiriti̍ saM - kRutiḥ|viśvakarmEti# viśva - karmA|iti|Eva|Enau|AtmanE̱|indrA̍ya|ajuhavuḥ|indra̍ḥ|hi|EtAni̍|rUpAṇi̍|kari̍krat|aca̍rat|asau|vai|Adityaḥ|śukraḥ|candramA̱ḥ|manthI|apigRuhyEtya̍pi̍ - gRuhya|prA~jcau̱|niriti̍|43̍ (50)
verses.samhita: &sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati tau dEvA apanudyA&&*tmana̍ indrAyAjuhavu-rapa̍nuttau̍ śaṇḍAmarkau# sahAmunEti# brUyAdyaM dviṣyAdyamEva dvEṣṭi tEnainau̍ sahApa# nudatE sa prathamaḥ̍ saMkRuti-rviśvakarmEtyEvainA̍-vAtmana̍ indrAyA-juhavurindrO̍ hyEtAni̍# rUpAṇi karikradaca̍radasau̍ vA Adityaḥ̍ śukraścandramA# manthyapi-gRuhya̍ prA~jcau ni- [ ] 43

verses.padam: - Padam krAmataḥ|tasmA̱t|prA~jcau̱|yantau̱|na|paśyanti|pratya~jcau̱|AvRutyEtyA̱ - vRutya|juhutaḥ|tasmA̱t|pratya~jcau̱|yantau̱|paśyanti|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|vai|EtE̍ iti|yajñasya̍|yat|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|nAsikA|uttaravEdirityu̍ttara-̍ vEdiḥ|aBitaḥ|parikramyEti̍# pari - kramya|juhutaḥ|tasmA̱t|aBita̍ḥ|nAsi̍kAm|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|tasmA̱t|nAsi̍kayA|cakṣu̍ṣI̍ iti|vidhRu̍tE̍ iti vi-dhRutE|sarvataḥ|parIti̍|krAmataḥ|rakṣa̍sAm|apa̍hatyA̍ ityapa# - hatyai|dEvAḥ|vai|yAḥ|prAcI̱ḥ|AhutIrityA̍ - hutIḥ|ajuhavuḥ|yE|purastA̱t|asu̍rAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|prEti̍|44̍ (50)
verses.samhita: -ṣkrAmata-stasmAt̍ prA~jcau yantau na paśyanti̍ pratya~jcAvAvRutya̍# juhutastasmA̱t pratya~jcau yantau# paśyanti cakṣuṣI̍ vA EtE yajñasya yacCukrAmanthinau nAsikOttaravEdiraBita̍ḥ̍ parikramya# juhutastasmAdaBitO̍ nAsikAM̍ cakṣuṣI̍ tasmAnnAsikayA̍ cakṣuṣI̍ vidhRutE̍ sarvataḥ pari# krAmatO rakṣasAmapa̍hatyai̍ dEvA vai yAḥ prAcIrAhutIraju̍havuryE̍ purastAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABiḥ prA- [ ] 44

verses.padam: - Padam anudanta|yAḥ|pratIcI̱ḥ|yE|paścAt|asurAḥ|Asann̍|tAn|tABi̍ḥ|apEti̍|anudanta|prAcI̱ḥ|anyAḥ|Ahu̍taya̍ ityA-hutayaḥ|hUyantE̱|pratya~jcau̱|śukrAmanthinAviti# śukrA - manthinau̱|paścAt|ca|Eva|purastA̱t|ca|yajamAnaḥ|BrAtRu̍vyAn|prEti̍|nudatE|tasmA̱t|parA̍cIḥ|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|vIyantE|pratIcI̱ḥ|jAyantE|śukrAmanthinAviti̍# śukrA - manthinau̱|vai|anviti|prajA̍ iti# pra - jAḥ|prEti|jAyantE|attrIḥ|ca|AdyA̱ḥ|ca|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prajanayanniti# pra - janayann|parIti̍|ihi|śukraḥ|śukraśO̍ciṣEti̍# śukra - śOciṣA|45 (50)
verses.samhita: -ṇudanta̍ yAḥ pratIcIryE paścAdasurA̍ Asan tAṅstABirapAnudanta̍ prAcIranyA̍ AhutayO̍ hUyantE̱ pratya~jcau# śukrAmanthinau# paścAccaiva purastA̱cca yajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAn̍ pra ṇudatE̍ tasmAt parAcIḥ̍ prajAḥ pra vIyantE̍ pratIcI̱rjAyantE śukrAmanthinau vA anu# prajAḥ pra jAyantE&ttrIścAdyA̱śca̍ suvIrA̱ḥ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi̍ śukraḥ śukraśOciṣA-̍ [ ] 45

verses.padam: - Padam suprajA iti# su - prajAḥ|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|prajanayanniti# pra - janayann|parIti̍|ihi|manthI|manthiśO̍ciṣEti̍# manthi - śOciṣA|iti|Aha|EtAḥ|vai|suvIrA̍ iti# su - vIrA̱ḥ|yA|attrIḥ|EtAḥ|suprajA iti# su - prajAḥ|yAḥ|AdyA̱ḥ|yaḥ|Evam|vEda|attrI|asya|prajEti̍# pra - jA|jAyatE|na|AdyA̱|prajApatEriti̍# prajA-patEḥ|akṣi|aśvayat|tat|parEti̍|apatat|tat|vika̍~gkatamiti̍ vi-ka~gkatam|prEti|aviśat|tat|vika̍~gkata̍ iti# vi - ka~gkatE|na|aramata|tat|yava̱m|prEti|aviśat|tat|yavE̱|aramata|tat|yava̍sya|46̍ (50)
verses.samhita: suprajAḥ prajAḥ prajanayan̍ parIhi̍ manthI manthiśOciṣEtyA̍haitA̍ vai suvIrA yA attrIrEtAḥ suprajA̍ yA AdyA# ya EvaM ~MvEdAtryasya̍ prajA jAyatE̍ nA&&dyA̱ prajApatErakṣya̍śvayat̍ tat parA&&*patat̍ tad vika~gkataM̍ prAviśat̍ tad vika~gkatE̍ nAramata̍ tad yavaM prAviśat̍ tad yavE&ramata̍ tad yavasya-̍ [ ] 46

verses.padam: - Padam yavatvamiti# yava - tvam|yat|vaika~gkatam|manthipAtramiti̍# manthi - pAtram|Bavati|saktu̍Biriti̍ saktu# - Biḥ|śrIṇAti|prajApa̍tEriti̍# prajA - patEḥ|Eva|tat|cakṣuḥ|samiti̍|Barati|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|manthipAtramiti̍# manthi - pAtram|sadaḥ|na|aśnutE|iti̍|ArtapAtramityA̱rta̍ - pAtram|hi|iti|brUyAt|yat|aśnuvIta|andhaḥ|addhvaryuḥ|syAt|Arti̱m|Eti̍|RucCEt|tasmA̱t|na|aśnutE||47̍ (37) (AtmanA parA - ni - ṣpra - śukraśOciṣA̍ - yavasya̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍ (A10)
verses.samhita: yavatvaM ~Myad vaika~gkataM̍ manthipAtraM Bavati̍ saktuBiḥ̍ śrIṇAti# prajApatErEva̍ taccakṣuḥ saM Barati̍ brahmavAdinO# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAnmanthipAtraṃ̍ sadO nAśnuta̍ ityA̱rtapAtraṃ hIti# brUyAd-yadaśnuvItAndhO̱&ddhvaryuḥ̍ syAdArtimArcCEt tasmAnnAśnutE||47̍ (AtmanA parA - ni - ṣpra - śukraśOciṣA̍ - yavasya̍ - saptatriṃśacca)̍

verses.padam: - Padam dEvAḥ|vai|yat|yajñE|akurvata|tat|asu̍rAḥ|akurvata|tE|dEvAḥ|AgrayaṇAgrAnityA̱grayaṇa̍ - agrAn|grahAn|apaśyann|tAn|agRuhṇata|tata̍ḥ|vai|tE|agra̱m|parIti̍|Ayann|yasya̍|Evam|viduṣa̍ḥ|AgrayaṇAgrA̍ ityA̱grayaṇa-agrAḥ|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyanta̱|agra̱m|Eva|samAnAnA̱m|parIti|Eti|rugṇavatyEti̍# rugṇa - vatyA|RucA|BrAtRuvyavata̍ iti BrAtRuvya-vataḥ|gRuhṇIyAt|BrAtRu̍vyasya|Eva|ruktvA|agra̱m|samAnAnA̱m|parIti̍|Eti|yE|dEvAḥ|divi|EkA̍daśa|stha|iti̍|Aha|48̍ (50)
verses.samhita: dEvA vai yad yajñE&kurvata̍ tadasurA̍ akurvata tE dEvA A̱grayaṇAgrAn grahAnapaśyan̍ tAnagRuhṇata̍ tatO vai tE&graM paryAyana.̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduṣa# AgrayaṇAgrA grahA# gRuhyantE&gramEva̍ samAnAnAM̍ paryEti̍ rugṇavatyarcA̍ BrAtRuvyavatO̍ gRuhṇIyAd-BrAtRuvyasyaiva̍ ruktvAgraṃ# samAnAnAM paryEti̍ yE dEvA̍ divyEkAdaśa̍ sthEtyAhai-̍ [ ] 48

verses.padam: - Padam EtAvatIḥ|vai|dEvatA̱ḥ|tABya̍ḥ|Eva|Enam|sarvA̱Byaḥ|gRuhṇAti|Eṣaḥ|tE|yOni̍ḥ|viśvE̱Byaḥ|tvA|dEvEBya̍ḥ|iti̍|Aha|vaiśvadEva̍ iti# vaiśva - dEvaḥ|hi|Eṣaḥ|dEvatayA|vAk|vai|dEvEBya̍ḥ|apEti̍|akrAmat|yajñAya̍|ati̍ṣṭhamAnA|tE|dEvAḥ|vAci|apa̍krAntAyAmityapa̍-krAntAyAm|tUṣṇIm|grahAn̍|agRuhṇata|sA|amanyata|vAk|antaḥ|yanti|vai|mA|iti̍|sA|Agrayaṇam|prati̍|Eti̍|agacCat|tat|Agrayaṇasya̍|AgrayaṇatvamityA̱grayaṇa̍ - tvam|49 (50)
verses.samhita: -tAvatIrvai̍ dEvatAstABya# Evainaṃq sarvA̱ByO gRuhṇAtyEṣa tE yOni rviśvE̱ByastvA dEvEBya ityAha̍ vaiśvadEvO hyEṣa̍ dEvatayA̍ vAgvai dEvEByO-&pA̱krAmad-yajñAyAtiṣṭhamAnA̍ tE dEvA vAcyapakrAntAyAM̍ tUṣṇIM grahAnagRuhṇata̍ sAmanyata̍ vAgantaryanti̍ vai mEti sA&&grayaṇaM̍ pratyAgacCat̍ tadA̱grayaṇasyA̱&&grayaṇatvaM- [ ] 49

verses.padam: - Padam tasmA̱t|AgrayaṇE|vAk|vIti|sRujyatE|yat|tUṣṇIm|pUrvE̱|grahA̱ḥ|gRuhyantE̱|yathA̱|thsArI|iya̍ti|mE|AKa̍ḥ|iya̍ti|na|apEti̍|rAthsyAmi|iti̍|upAvasRujatItyu̍pa̍ - avasRujati|Evam|Eva|tat|addhvaryuḥ|Agrayaṇam|gRuhItvA|yajñam|AraByEtyA̱-raBya̍|vAca̱m|vIti̍|sRujatE|triḥ|him|karOti|udgAtRUnityu̍t̍ - gAtRUn|Eva|tat|vRuṇItE|prajApatiriti̍# prajA - patiḥ|vai|Eṣaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇam|gRuhItvA|hikaMqrOtIti# him - karOti|prajApa̍tiriti̍# prajA-patiḥ|Eva|50 (50)
verses.samhita: tasmAdAgrayaṇE̍ vAgvi sRujyatE̍ yat tUṣṇIM pUrvE grahA# gRuhyantE yathA̱thsArIyati̍ ma AKa iyati̍ nApa# rAthsyA-mItyupAvasRujatyEvamEva̍ tadaddhvaryurA̱grayaṇaM̍ gRuhItvA̍ yajñamAraBya vAcaM ~Mvi sRujatE̍ triṛhiM karOtyudgAtRU-nEva̍ tad vRuṇItE̍ prajApatirvA̍ Eṣa yadA̱grayaṇO yadA̱grayaṇaM gRuhItvA̍ hiM̍ karOti# prajApatirEva-̍ [ ] 50

verses.padam: - Padam tat|prajA iti# pra - jAḥ|aBIti|jiGrati|tasmA̱t|vathsam|jAtam|gauḥ|aBIti̍|jiGrati|AtmA|vai|Eṣaḥ|yajñasya̍|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|sava̍nEsavana̍ iti savanE̍ - savanE|aBIti|gRuhṇAti|Atmann|Eva|yajñam|samiti̍|tanOti|upari̍ṣṭAt|Eti̍|nayati|rEta̍ḥ|Eva|tat|dadhAti|adhastA̱t|upEti̍|gRuhṇAti|prEti̍|janayati|Eva|tat|brahmavAdina̍ iti# brahma - vAdinaḥ|vadanti|kasmA̱t|satyAt|gAyatrI|kani̍ṣṭhA|Canda̍sAm|satI|sarvA̍ṇi|sava̍nAni|vahati|iti̍# ( )|Eṣaḥ|vai|gAyatriyai|vathsaḥ|yat|Agrayaṇaḥ|tam|Eva|tat|aBinivartamityaBi̍ - nivarta̱m|sarvAṇi|sava̍nAni|vahati|tasmA̱t|vathsam|apAkRu̍tamitya̍pa̍ - AkRutam|gauḥ|aBa|nIti̍|vartatE||51̍ (70) (AhA&& - grayaṇatvaM - prajApatirEvE̍ - ti# - viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) Prasna Korvai with starting Padams of 1 to 11 Anuvaakams :- (yajñEna tA upayaḍBi̍# - rdEvA vai yajñamAgnI̱dhrE - brahmavAdinaḥ sa tvai - dEvasya grAvAṇaM̍ - prAṇO vA upAṅqśva̍grA̍ - dEvA vA upAṃqśau̍ - vAgvai - mitraM - ~Myajñasya - bRuhaspati# - rdEvA vA A̱grayaṇAgrA - nEkAdaśa)̍ Korvai with starting Padams of 1, 11, 21 śeries of Panchaatis :- (yajñEna# - lOkE paśumAnth̍ syAth - savanaM̍ mAdhyandinaM̍ - ~MvAgvA - ariktAni̍ - tat prajA - Ekapa~jcAśat)̍ First and Last Padam of Fourth Prasnam of 6th Kandam (yajñEna - ni vartatE)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM pada pAṭhE ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||==================================
verses.samhita: tat prajA aBi jiGrati̍ tasmA̱d vathsaM jAtaM gauraBi jiGratyAtmA̍ vA Eṣa yajñasya yadA̱grayaṇaḥ savanEsavanE&Bi̍ gRuhṇAtyAtmannEva̍ yajñaṃ saM tanOtyupari̍ṣṭAdA̍ nayati̍ rEta# Eva tad dadhAtyadhastAdupa̍# gRuhṇAti pra janayatyEva̍ tadbrahmavAdinO̍# vadanti kasmA̱th satyAd-gAyatrI̍ kaniṣṭhA̍ CandasAṃ̍ satI sarvAṇi̍ savanAni̍ vahatItyE ( )-ṣa vai gAyatriyai̍ vathsO yadA̱grayaṇastamEva tadaBinivartaṃq̍ sarvAṇi̍ savanAni̍ vahati tasmA̱d vathsamapAkRutaM̍ gauraBi ni vartatE||51̍ (AhA&& - grayaṇatvaM - prajApatirEvE̍ - ti# - viṃśatiśca)̍ (A11) praśna kOrvai with starting padams of 1 to 11 anuvAkams :- (yajñEna tA upayaḍBi̍# - rdEvA vai yajñamAgnI̱dhrE - brahmavAdinaḥ sa tvai - dEvasya grAvAṇaM̍ - prAṇO vA upAṅqśva̍grA̍ - dEvA vA upAṃqśau̍ - vAgvai - mitraM - ~Myajñasya - bRuhaspati# - rdEvA vA A̱grayaṇAgrA - nEkAdaśa)̍ kOrvai with starting padams of 1, 11, 21 series of pa~jcAtis :- (yajñEna# - lOkE paśumAnth̍ syAth - savanaM̍ mAdhyandinaM̍ - ~MvAgvA - ariktAni̍ - tat prajA - Ekapa~jcAśat)̍ first and last padam of fourth praśnam of 6th KAṇḍam (yajñEna - ni vartatE)||hari̍ḥ̍ OM||||kRuṣṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya saMhitAyAM ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE caturthaḥ praśnaḥ samAptaḥ||----------------------------------------------------------------------- OM namaḥ paramAtmanE, śrI mahAgaṇapatayE namaḥ, śrI guruByO namaḥ hariḥ OM 6.5 ṣaṣṭhakAṇḍE pa~jcamaḥ praśnaḥ - sOmamantrabrAhmaṇanirUpaṇaM
